root.name: Haunted Castle
root.description: Overview Someone looms over this happily married couple...Haunted Castle (known in Japan as Akumaj≈ç Dracula, translated to Devil's Castle Dracula) is an action horror platformer developed and released by Konami for the arcades on September 22, 1988. A loose remake of the original Castlevania, Haunted Castle is one of the two Castlevania games to be released in American arcades (with the other being Vs. Castlevania). In Japan, the game was ported to the PlayStation 2 by HAMSTER in 2006 as Oretachi Geasen Zoku Sono 15: Akumajou Dracula. GameplayWorld map of Haunted CastleThe player controls Simon Belmont, who must rescue his bride, Serena, from the clutches of the evil Count Dracula using his whip and other weapons like a chain or sword at his disposal.There are six levels(1.Graveyard / 2.Cave / 3.Banquet Room / 4.Basement / 5.Clocktower / 6.Vampire's Room) Simon Belmont has fight through to free his bride Serena. Each level has a levelboss and at the end of stage 6 Simon Belmont has to fight against Dracula. Stages with their respective bosses:StageBoss01. Graveyard: Medusa 02. Cave: Skeleton Dragon Creature03. Banquet Room: Stained Glass Knight04. Basement: Giant Rock Creature05. Clocktower: Frankenstein's Monster06. Vampire's Room: Dracula
